compliant.section: With Your consent: We may disclose Your personal information for any other purpose with Your consent.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing: Consent; Conditions for consent

non_compliant.section: If You interact with other users or register through a Third-Party Social Media Service, Your contacts on the Third-Party Social Media Service may see Your name, profile, pictures and description of Your activity. Similarly, other users will be able to view descriptions of Your activity, communicate with You and view Your profile.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: Purpose limitation
non_compliant.amend: This section needs to clearly state the specific, explicit, and legitimate purposes for processing user data when interacting with third-party social media services. It should specify what data is shared, why it's necessary, and how it aligns with the service's core functionality.

non_compliant.section: The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: Storage limitation; Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject: Period for which the personal data will be stored
non_compliant.amend: While stating data will be retained "as long as necessary" is a good start, it lacks specificity. The policy should define concrete retention periods for different data categories based on their purpose. For example, data needed for account activity might be retained for as long as the account is active, while marketing preferences might have a shorter retention period.
